body:

-thin manual

-difficult to pour in water as it is a small slot at the both sides at the back of the tank
-if your hands are a bit shaky when putting in the ground beans, it takes a sweet while to get the inside cleaned out.

All in all I am a bit disappointed. Neither the programming or the clock function is of any use, so I did not get what I thought I bought.
